title: switch​

title: observeLastInputType​
content: </> UserInputServiceUtils.observeLastInputType() → Observable<UserInputType > Returns an observable with the last input type

title: isKeyboardInput​
content: </> UserInputServiceUtils.isKeyboardInput(input: UserInputType ) → bool Checks if the provided input is from a keyboard

title: isTouchInput​
